msContents.summary: Letter written in Dampierre, postmarked 6 August 1835, referring to experiments that the writer wishes to undertake before submitting his metallurgical process (procédé métallurgique). Addressed to Monsieur Bérard, 21 rue des Mathurins. A note records a response by the recipient on 12 August 1835. The letter was folded for mailing and has an address and postmarks on the former exterior.
